abstract: Preliminary hearing in case of Sgt Bowe Bergdahl on charges of desertion and endangering his rescuers, could lead to court-martial; defense attorneys expected to challenge official account of his 2014 rescue from Taliban, which public has vigorously debated despite most details being classified; Republican presidential candidates use case to critique Pres Barack Obama.
lead_paragraph: A hearing on Thursday will lead to a decision whether to court-martial Sergeant Bergdahl, 29, who was captured and held by the Taliban for five years.

headline.main: Details on Bowe Bergdahl, Soldier Freed by Taliban, May Emerge at Hearing
headline.print_headline: Details About Soldier Freed by Taliban Could Emerge at Hearing
